Thanks to Martin at datdota.com for providing an automated feed for us to automatically generate the competitive tier data. You can find it here. Look for new features soon! more...

Time Data Added to Front Page 04/24/2014

This is something I’ve been wanting to do for a while. A graph of the time data now appears based on your selection on the homepage to give you an idea of how well your team will perform as the game goes on. Special thanks to Nathan Lapp who finally... more...

All New Heroes Added 03/03/2014

After having a few people request the new heroes be added, I finally stopped being lazy and did it. Special thanks to Quin Rogers, Chris Lizama, and Zach Wester for helping out. Feel free to email corrections or anything you think should be different. Heroes added: Ember Spirit Earth Spirit... more...

Winrate vs. Time Data 11/19/2013

This has been something I’ve been wanting to do for a long time now, so after a good deal of work and help from a friend, we have winrate data for over 220,000 games. Yeah, that’s a lot. Go check it out. more...

Minor bug fixes and refactoring 11/07/2013

There was a bug that caused suggestions to not appear when a text search was being performed, which is fixed now. I also refactored the code base in preparation for (eventual) release to github. more...

Version 0.1 (beta) released 10/30/2013

The initial beta version of the site has been released! At the moment, the hero stats and advice section are likely to be inaccurate. Over the forseeable future, I am looking for folks to help me get more accurate hero role data and advice generation. more...
